description: Survey of basic concepts and techniques in artificial intelligence, including problem solving, knowledge representation, and machine learning.Prereq: 2331 or 5331; and Math 2174 or 2568 or 4568 or 5520H; and Stat 3201 or 3450 or 3460 or 3470 or 4201 or Math 4530 or 5530H; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, ECE or Data Analytics major. Not open to students with credit for 5521.
